Headline: #49 Western Temporary Southbound Reroute near Western/Harrison
ShortDescription: Southbound  49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Harrison, California and Roosevelt: due to, police activity near Western/Harrison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound  #49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Harrison, California and Roosevelt: due to, police activity near Western/Harrison.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
